item.title: Boston 2018
item.author: hayden.macdonald.8778@gmail.com (Hayden MacDonald)
item.description: I recently travelled to Boston to attend Edward Tufte’s one day course, “Presenting Data and Information”. I learned about the course through twitter and later did some reading about Tufte, who is an esteemed professor emeritus of political science and statistics at Yale and previously taught with John Tukey. As a future business analytics student, I was interested in taking a convenient one day course taught by a world expert in data visualization.
